summary: Adds the cast of Final Fantasy 10 as followers.
descriptionHtml:
This is my second mod, and i think i am getting the hang of it.  This mod will add the cast of Final Fantasy 10 to skyrim, to be recruited as potential followers.  all are marriageable.

Companions added:
     Tidus- 1 handed warrior
     Yuna- Conjuration/Restoration
     Auron- 2 handed warrior 
     Wakka- 1 handed warrior*
     Lulu- destruction
     Kimahri- 2 handed warrior
     Rikku- 1 Handed/Thief
     Paine- 2 handed warrior

I have included Paine(FFX-2) because shes awesome, and i figured it was appropriate.  i will hopefully get pics uploaded in the next day or so, if my computer cooperates. 

Locations:
     Solitude- The Winking Skeever
     Dragons Bridge- Four Shields Tavern
     Riverwood- Sleeping Giant Inn
     High Hrothgar- main area
     Riften- The Ragged Flagon

I have plans to add Yunalesca, Jecht, and Seymour as villains in a seperate .esp file.

Required Mods:
     ApachiSkyhair- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Recommended Mods:
     Nordic Spears- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15294
     Throwing Weapons- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14176
     Sunglasses- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29432
     Cloaks- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092

Change log:
     1.5- minor bug fixes.
           added several images.hopefully more to come.

     2.0- fixed the facetint issue

Thanks to:
     Scorpiovaedon for suggesting to do this mod.  you only get better by doing.
     The Nexus Community- for dowloading my other mod and giving the feedback needed to 
          make that mod and future mods the best they can be.
     Bethesda- for making Skyrim and the Creation Kit.
author: Mrlucius
